name: Plan R - Organic Anti-Inflammatory Muscle Builder

Breakfast.details: Organic Anti-Inflammatory Smoothie Bowl: 1 cup organic mixed berries, 1 cup organic spinach, 1 scoop organic plant-based protein powder, 1 tbsp organic ground flaxseed, 1 tbsp organic almond butter, 1 cup organic unsweetened almond milk, 1/4 cup organic granola
Breakfast.instructions: Blend berries, spinach, protein powder, flaxseed, almond butter, and almond milk. Pour into a bowl and top with granola.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Turmeric Latte with Nuts: 1 cup organic unsweetened almond milk, 1 tsp organic turmeric powder, 1/4 tsp organic black pepper, 1 tsp organic honey, 1/4 cup organic mixed nuts
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Heat almond milk with turmeric, black pepper, and honey. Serve with a side of mixed nuts.

Lunch.details: Organic Salmon and Quinoa Bowl: 6 oz organic grilled salmon, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic mixed greens, 1/4 organic avocado, 1/4 cup organic cherry tomatoes, 2 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 tbsp organic lemon juice
Lunch.instructions: Grill salmon. Combine quinoa, greens, avocado, and tomatoes. Top with salmon and dress with olive oil and lemon juice.

Afternoon Snack.details: Organic Greek Yogurt with Cherries: 1 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup organic tart cherries, 1 tbsp organic honey, 2 tbsp organic pumpkin seeds
Afternoon Snack.instructions: Top yogurt with cherries, honey, and pumpkin seeds.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Ginger and Pineapple Smoothie: 1 cup organic pineapple chunks, 1 inch organic fresh ginger, 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder, 1 cup organic coconut water

Post-Workout Dinner.details: Organic Turmeric Chicken with Sweet Potato: 6 oz organic chicken breast, 1 tsp organic turmeric powder, 1 large organic sweet potato, 2 cups organic kale, 2 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 organic lemon
Post-Workout Dinner.instructions: Season chicken with turmeric and grill. Roast sweet potato. Saut√© kale in olive oil. Serve with a squeeze of lemon.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Tart Cherry Juice with Almonds: 1 cup organic tart cherry juice, 1/4 cup organic almonds
Evening Snack.instructions: Enjoy tart cherry juice with a side of almonds.
